definition: to put to good use/to come in handy
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: Once the tire failure, accompanied the spare tire will come in handy.
sentences.chinese: 一旦轮胎发生故障，随车携带的备胎就可派上用场。

sentences.english: This is a nifty feature that can come in handy for avid users.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个对于热心用户可以派上用场的精巧功能。

sentences.english: The portable system for quick diagnosis can be deployed during outbreaks to keep them from becoming pandemics.
sentences.chinese: 该系统能在疫情爆发时派上用场，防止疾病流行。

sentences.english: Mushroom stone and slate could be both used.
sentences.chinese: 此种装修，“蘑菇石”和“板岩”都能派上用场。

sentences.english: It can work for snow, too.
sentences.chinese: 在玩雪时它也能派上用场。

sentences.english: There are instances where a professor recommendation could be useful.
sentences.chinese: 这里有些例子能够数模教授的推荐信能派上用场。

sentences.english: Every single bit allowed by the laws of thermodynamics is put to use.
sentences.chinese: 每一个被热力学定律所允许的位元，都派上用场。

sentences.english: The third area where analytical frameworks come in handy is in training.
sentences.chinese: 分析框架可派上用场的第三种情况是在培训中。

sentences.english: The Web Developer Tool will also come in handy on this website.
sentences.chinese: 这个网站的网站开发工具迟早也会派上用场。

sentences.english: "I hope that this will eventually find its way into clinical reality," says Lelkes.
sentences.chinese: 我希望这项技术最终能在临床实践中派上用场。

sentences.english: Every single bit allowed by the laws of thermodynamics is put to use .
sentences.chinese: 每一个被热力学定律所允许的元，都派上用场。

sentences.english: How to remove the sty eye may "come" in handy one day.
sentences.chinese: 知道如何让眼睛的麦粒肿消除可能派上用场的一天。

sentences.english: The recent publications in Komsomolskaya Pravda has come in handy.
sentences.chinese: 最近的出版物在共青团真理报已经派上用场。

sentences.english: They also come in handy when you are moving to and from school.
sentences.chinese: 当你要将东西搬出搬进学校时，它们也能派上用场。

sentences.english: Lead is often used because of its weight.
sentences.chinese: 铅因其重而常派上用场。

sentences.english: And in these instance, racemization can really come in handy.
sentences.chinese: 在那些案例中，外消旋化就能真的派上用场。

definition: ample scope for abilities/favorable position for the use of one's skills (idiom)
a possible period of want or need
Preparedness averts peril./to be prepared, just in case (idiom)
magical object/object symbolic of imperial power/fine weapon
successfully accomplished (project or goal)/to be highly successful
